alert.note: Alert for Green; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:32AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette and Green Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 132 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Platteville to 6 miles east of Monroe. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Brodhead, Darlington, Shullsburg, Albany, Belmont, Benton, Argyle, Apple River, Wiota, New Diggings, South Wayne, Elk Grove, Fayette, Lamont, Browntown, Gratiot, Platte Mounds, Calamine, and Lead Mine. This includes U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 23 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
